block.para: .NET Foundation Model (ML) Playground is a .NET MAUI Blazor sample application showcasing how to leverage &BRlong; from C# code. This example application is not production-ready. It illustrates how .NET and C# developers can leverage &BR; to build generative AI enabled applications. In order to let you test and interact with the foundation models accessible via &BR; API, the .NET FM Playground offers you four playgrounds:
In addition, it also lists and displays the foundation models you have access to and their characteristics. For source code and deployment instructions, see the project in GitHub.
